ozmod

クラス OZMod

  • java.lang.Object
    • ozmod.OZMod

  • public class OZMod
extends java.lang.Object
    The OZMod kernel where output device are managed.

      • getOutputName

        public java.lang.String getOutputName(int _i)
        Gets the name of an output device.
        パラメータ:
        _i - The zero indexed output device.
        戻り値:
        The name of the device.

      • getOutputDescription

        public java.lang.String getOutputDescription(int _i)
        Gets the description of an output device.
        パラメータ:
        _i - The zero indexed output device.
        戻り値:

      • initOutput

        public OZMod.ERR initOutput()
        Initializes the standard output device.
        戻り値:
        NOERR if no error occured.

      • initOutput

        public OZMod.ERR initOutput(int _deviceIndex)
        Initializes an output device given its index. All output are 44100Hz, 16 bits, stereo.
        戻り値:
        NOERR if no error occured.

      • getClipSound

        public Sound getClipSound(java.io.File _file)
        Gets a clips sound. The sound can be in WAV format, AIFF or AU.
        パラメータ:
        _file - The disk file of the sound.
        戻り値:
        The Sound instance or null if an error occured. If an error occured use getLastError() to determine the error.

      • wordSwap

        public static short wordSwap(short _value)
        Swap the low and high bytes of a word.
        パラメータ:
        _value - The word to swap the bytes.
        戻り値:
        The swapped word.

      • getLastError

        public static final OZMod.ERR getLastError()
        Gets the last error occured. An error is usually directly returned by a method, but this method keeps a track of any error.
        戻り値:
        The last error occured. If NOERR is returned, no error happened during the last OZMOd call.
